title: Esau Sells His Inheritance to Jacob
description:
Readings from:

Genesis 25:29-34

Malachi 1:2-3

Hebrews 12:16-17

Today's passages were read by Noah Kirby, a digital marketing strategist in Bloomington, Illinois.
